summary: An angst-ridden teen dealing with his dysfunctional family hits the streets. The story is inter-cut with various psychedelic, energetic vignettes.
cast: Hideaki Sasaki|Masahiro Saito|Yukiko Kobayashi|Fudeko Tanaka|Sei Hiraizumi|Keiko Niitaka|Maki Asakawa|Jennifer Merin|Akihiro Miwa|J.A. Seazer
keywords: psychedelic|dysfunctional family|japanese new wave|sex scene|female nudity
title: Sho o suteyo machi e deyô
